summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DynoPay Next.js 16 payment application. All core features working correctly including clipboard copy functionality and language selector with locale switching.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal backdrop intercepts clicks when mobile drawer is open, preventing language selection in some scenarios
ui_bugs.workaround: Close mobile drawer before using language selector

passed_tests: Copy Invoice button functionality with fallback clipboard implementation
Language selector dropdown displays all 6 options (EN, FR, ES, PT, DE, NL)
Language selection changes URL locale correctly (/pay/demo to /fr/pay/demo)
Theme toggle works on both desktop and mobile
Main page loads correctly with welcome content
Demo payment page loads with all elements
Mobile responsiveness with working mobile menu
All data-testid attributes present and functional
No console errors or page crashes
Internationalization working (content changes to selected language)
